thread.title: ‘Yes, there’s been a lot of lying’: Tucker Carlson interviews Congressman Jim Himes about Obamacare
thread.title_full: ‘Yes, there’s been a lot of lying’: Tucker Carlson interviews Congressman Jim Himes about Obamacare

author: William A.
title: ‘Yes, there’s been a lot of lying’: Tucker Carlson interviews Congressman Jim Himes about Obamacare
text:
‘Yes, there’s been a lot of lying’: Tucker Carlson interviews Congressman Jim Himes about Obamacare Posted at 8:30 pm on January 4, 2017 by William A. 
Democratic Congressman Jim Himes was on “Tucker Carlson Tonight” Wednesday night to talk about the Democrats’ efforts to save Obamacare from repeal. 
Video: 
— FILTHY #NEWS (@FILTH ) January 5, 2017 . @jahimes : “The core promise of #ObamaCare was that for the first time ever, the US would have the ability to cover all of its people.” pic.twitter.com/DEgM5sAWIn 
— Fox News (@FoxNews) January 5, 2017 . @jahimes : There will be anger and uprising if #Obamacare is repealed but not replaced. #Tucker pic.twitter.com/kxY61lRUQO 
— Fox News (@FoxNews) January 5, 2017 
There was plenty of reaction on Twitter from people who have seen the effect of Obamacare on their insurance premiums: @TuckerCarlson just got a DEM @jahimes to admit "yes, there's been a lot of lying" re: ACA
